BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO PISCMM_MOM_TRN (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_COMM_ID, STR_MEETING_ID, DT_OF_MEETING, DT_MINUTE_PREPARED_ON, DT_CIRCULATED_ON, STR_VIA_LETTER_NO, STR_MINUTES_FNAME, GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

INSERT INTO PISCMM_MOM_DTL (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_COMM_ID, STR_MEETING_ID,STR_AGENDA_SEQ_NO,STR_AGENDA_NO,STR_DEC_ACT_DECIDED,NUM_ACT_TAKEN_DEPT,STR_REMARKS,GDT_EFFECT_DATE, GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE PISCMM_MET_FILE_TRN T SET T.STR_MEETING_STATUS=? WHERE T.STR_MEETING_ID=? AND T.GNUM_ISVALID=1 and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
DELETE FROM PISCMM_MOM_DTL A WHERE A.STR_MEETING_ID=? and A.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

UPDATE PISCMM_MOM_TRN T SET T.DT_MINUTE_PREPARED_ON=?, T.DT_CIRCULATED_ON=?, T.STR_VIA_LETTER_NO=?, T.STR_MINUTES_FNAME=?, T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.STR_MEETING_ID=? AND T.GNUM_ISVALID=1 and T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO PISCMM_MOM_DTL (GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE,NUM_COMM_ID,STR_MEETING_ID,STR_AGENDA_SEQ_NO,STR_AGENDA_NO,STR_DEC_ACT_DECIDED,NUM_ACT_TAKEN_DEPT,STR_REMARKS,GDT_EFFECT_DATE,GDT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID) VALUES(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE PISCMM_MOM_TRN SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_MEETING_ID=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1 and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE PISCMM_MOM_DTL SET GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE STR_MEETING_ID=? AND GNUM_ISVALID=1 and GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
